Posts.Title: Lump, cyst, pain, 25 BlueLotus djmammo

Posts.Content: BlueLotus wrote: I've started to have pains in my armpit in February. At that moment I haven't felt anything when I checked, so I wasn't really worried. In March I had a sharp pain during the night in my left breast and when i checked it was something there. I did an ultrasound (since I'm 25 they didn't recommed a mamography) and the doctor found a cyst. Since the pain was still there I got checked again and they found a lump of 2 mm (additionally to that cyst of 2 cm) and swollen lymphatic nodes (18 mm) and I've got the diagnosis of dysplasia. Another check in 6 months was recommended. My gyn didn't recommend any other blood tests, even if she knows that my grandmother(from my mother side) had breast cancer. I feel quite worried since the pain in my armpit didn't stop and the lymphatic nodes are even bigger than 3 weeks ago ( now I can feel them when i check them). I don't know what to do....should i wait and see? or should i check a second opinion? i think that she didn't pay attention to my case. i don't want to ignore it and then find out that it's advanced. On the other hand i don't want to exaggerate. It's hard to be fully rational in this situation. Log in to post a reply
